title: [Hall of Patrons, Rotunda]
description: Eight arches supported by gold-veined marble columns encircle this large rotunda.  A forged chandelier hangs suspended from the lofty, domed ceiling, illuminating the room.  Six pedestals form a small circle beneath the chandelier, in the center of the rotunda.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest
